description: Attempting to access Fragment context, resources, or activity when Fragment is not attached. Common lifecycle issue.
commonCauses: Calling getActivity() in background thread callback
Resources accessed when Fragment not attached
Async operations completing after Fragment destroyed
solutions: Use context ?: return to safely handle null context
Store context reference carefully with lifecycle checks
prevention: Always use viewLifecycleOwner for view observations
Check isAdded before context access in callbacks
Cancel background work in appropriate lifecycle methods
Use Kotlin's context?.let { } for safe access
Use WorkManager for work that outlives Fragment
Structure code to respect Fragment lifecycle
